short_summary: Heating & Ventilation system repair in Military bases
description: Work under this requirement comprises the furnishing of all labour, materials, tools and equipment required to repair or replace Refrigeration, Air-Conditioning, Plumbing, Hydronic Heating, Propane, Natural Gas and Ventilation Systems at 5 CDSB Gagetown in accordance with this specification provided.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Trade Agreement Requirement Notice
##### Reference Number: WS4657562183

**Notice Title**  
W6898-250708 - Air, Heat & Vent Repair – CFB Gagetown

**Notice Type**  
Request for Standing Offer - Competitive - Open Bidding

**Notice Description**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting a contractor to provide repair or replacement services for Refrigeration, Air-Conditioning, Plumbing, Hydronic Heating, Propane, Natural Gas, and Ventilation Systems at the CDSB Gagetown 5 Division in New Brunswick.

**Key Details:**

* **Closing Date**: 2024-07-30 14:00:00
* **Contract Duration**: 2024-07-25 to 2026-07-31
* **North American Industrial Classification System (NAICS)**  
* 72101510: Plumbing System Maintenance or Repair
* 72101519: Gas Fitting Installation Services
* 72151204: HVAC Ventilation and Duct Work Construction
* 72154400: Pipefitting Fabrication and Maintenance Services

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to contractors subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Contracting Authority:**

The Contracting Authority is Dylon Leonard, PSPC/SPAC. For any questions or issues related to this opportunity, please contact Dylon Leonard at dylon.leonard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:**

The complete notice and all documentation are available on the Ariba Discovery portal at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20208306?extsite=MjAyMDgzMDZfQU4wMTQ
